## Reticulate

```{r}
library(reticulate)
os <- import("os")
os$listdir(".")
```

```{r}
source_python("add.py")
add(3,4)
```


```{r}
np <- import("numpy", convert = FALSE)

x <- np$array(c(1:4))
sum <- x$cumsum()

print(sum)

py_to_r(sum)
```

## Sparse Matrix
```{r}
library(Matrix)
N <- 6 
set.seed(123)
sparse_mat <- sparseMatrix(
  i = sample(N,N, replace = F),
  j = sample(N,N, replace = F),
  x = runif(N),
  dims = c(N,N)
)
sparse_mat
sparse_mat_py <- r_to_py(sparse_mat)
```
